languages.text: "И правда ведь... что, если я взорвусь рядом с вами или кем-то еще, кто мне дорог? Я так была поглощена спасением своей тщедушной душонки, что совсем забыла об этом. Вы правы, я должна обезвредить себя".

traits.locale_text: "И правда ведь... что если я взорвусь рядом с вами или кем-то еще, кто мне дорог? Я так была поглощена спасением своей тщедушной душонки, что совсем забыла об этом. Вы правы, я должна обезвредить себя".
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Good point... What if I blow up when I'm right next to you or someone else I care about? I've been so focused on saving my own selfish soul that I completely forgot. You're right. I have to stop being a danger to those around me."
languages.original_text: "И правда ведь... что, если я взорвусь рядом с вами или кем-то еще, кто мне дорог? Я так была поглощена спасением своей тщедушной душонки, что совсем забыла об этом. Вы правы, я должна обезвредить себя".

traits.locale_text: "Good point... What if I explode right next to you or someone else dear to me? I've been so focused on saving my own selfish soul that I completely forgot. You're right. I have to stop being a danger to those around me."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Good point... What if I explode right next to you or someone else dear to me? I've been so focused on saving my own selfish soul that I completely forgot. You're right. I have to stop being a danger to those around me."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Good point... What if I blow up when I'm right next to you or someone else I care about? I've been so focused on saving my own selfish soul that I completely forgot. You're right. I have to stop being a danger to those around me."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Good point... What if I blow up when I'm right next to you or someone else I care about? I've been so focused on saving my own selfish soul that I completely forgot. You're right. I have to stop being a danger to those around me."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Good point... What if I blow up when I'm right next to you or someone else I care about? I've been so focused on saving my own selfish soul that I completely forgot. You're right. I have to stop being a danger to those around me."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “你说得有道理……如果我失控的时候你就在旁边，或者我其他在意的人就在旁边，那该怎么办？我一直都太在乎我自私的灵魂，完全忘记了这件事情。你说得没错，我不能再给周围的人带来威胁了。”
languages.original_text: "Good point... What if I blow up when I'm right next to you or someone else I care about? I've been so focused on saving my own selfish soul that I completely forgot. You're right. I have to stop being a danger to those around me."

traits.locale_text: “你说得有道理……如果我失控的时候你就在旁边，或者我其他在意的人就在旁边，那该怎么办？我一直都太在乎我自私的灵魂，完全忘记了这件事情。你说得没错，我不能再给周围的人带来威胁了。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Es cierto... ¿y si estallo cuando estoy cerca de usted u otra persona que me importe? He estado tan centrada en salvarme que, en mi egoísmo, no lo había pensado. Tiene razón. Tengo que dejar de ser un riesgo para todos los que me rodean».
languages.original_text: "Good point... What if I blow up when I'm right next to you or someone else I care about? I've been so focused on saving my own selfish soul that I completely forgot. You're right. I have to stop being a danger to those around me."

traits.locale_text: «Es cierto... ¿y si estallo cuando estoy cerca de usted u otra persona que me importe? He estado tan centrada en salvarme que, en mi egoísmo, no lo había pensado. Tiene razón. Tengo que dejar de ser un riesgo para todos los que me rodean».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Gutes Argument ... Was, wenn ich direkt neben Euch explodiere? Oder neben jemand anderem, der mir wichtig ist? Ich war so darauf fokussiert, meine eigenen selbstsüchtige Seele zu retten, dass ich das vollkommen außer Acht gelassen habe. Ihr habt recht. Ich darf nicht länger eine Gefahr für meine Umgebung darstellen."
languages.original_text: "Good point... What if I blow up when I'm right next to you or someone else I care about? I've been so focused on saving my own selfish soul that I completely forgot. You're right. I have to stop being a danger to those around me."

traits.locale_text: "Gutes Argument ... Was, wenn ich direkt neben Euch explodiere? Oder neben jemand anderem, der mir wichtig ist? Ich war so darauf fokussiert, meine eigenen selbstsüchtige Seele zu retten, dass ich das vollkommen außer Acht gelassen habe. Ihr habt recht. Ich darf nicht länger eine Gefahr für meine Umgebung darstellen."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「確かにそうね…もし陛下や大切な人といる時に怒りを爆発させてしまったら…自分の利己的な魂を救うことに集中していて、すっかり忘れていたわ。陛下の言う通りね。いつまでも『危険な存在』でいるわけにはいかないものね」
languages.original_text: "Good point... What if I blow up when I'm right next to you or someone else I care about? I've been so focused on saving my own selfish soul that I completely forgot. You're right. I have to stop being a danger to those around me."

traits.locale_text: 「確かにそうね…もし陛下や大切な人といる時に怒りを爆発させてしまったら…自分の利己的な魂を救うことに集中していて、すっかり忘れていたわ。陛下の言う通りね。いつまでも『危険な存在』でいるわけにはいかないものね」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Certes. Je pourrais exploser à côté de vous ou de quelqu'un d'autre qui m'est cher. J'étais tellement obsédée par l'idée de sauver mon âme égoïste que tout cela m'est sorti de la tête. Vous avez raison. Il faut que je cesse d'être un danger pour ceux qui m'entourent. »
languages.original_text: "Good point... What if I blow up when I'm right next to you or someone else I care about? I've been so focused on saving my own selfish soul that I completely forgot. You're right. I have to stop being a danger to those around me."

traits.locale_text: « Certes. Je pourrais exploser à côté de vous ou de quelqu'un d'autre qui m'est cher. J'étais tellement obsédée par l'idée de sauver mon âme égoïste que tout cela m'est sorti de la tête. Vous avez raison. Il faut que je cesse d'être un danger pour ceux qui m'entourent. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Güzel bir noktaya değindin. Ya senin ya da umursadığım birinin yanında patlarsam? Kendi bencil ruhumu kurtarmaya o kadar odaklanmışım ki tamamen unutmuşum. Haklısın. Etrafımdakilere daha fazla tehlike oluşturmamalıyım."
languages.original_text: "Good point... What if I blow up when I'm right next to you or someone else I care about? I've been so focused on saving my own selfish soul that I completely forgot. You're right. I have to stop being a danger to those around me."

traits.locale_text: "Güzel bir noktaya değindin. Ya senin ya da umursadığım birinin yanında patlarsam? Kendi bencil ruhumu kurtarmaya o kadar odaklanmışım ki tamamen unutmuşum. Haklısın. Etrafımdakilere daha fazla tehlike oluşturmamalıyım."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
